title: Is there any obtuse angle in a right-angled triangle? - Quora

response.answer_text: NO…as sum of measure of all angle in a triangle is 180°. Now, in right angle angled triangle one of the measure is 90°, so the sum of remaining two side is 90°. Also, in triangle no angle can be of 0°. So,we can conclude that, remaining two angle has to be acute angle…it cannot be neither right nor obtuse angle. Thankyou..

No. As it is a right angled triangle one of the angle must be 90° and since the sum of the angles in a triangle is 180° ,the sum of the other two angles must be 90°. So it can't be possible to an angle go beyond 89°.
